Module com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager
Package com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.ui.table.TableRow

Class WatchlistRow

java.lang.Object
com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.ui.table.TableRow.AbstractStockRow
com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.ui.table.TableRow.WatchlistRow
public class WatchlistRow extends AbstractStockRow
View-model for a watchlist table row. Extends AbstractStockRow with current price and a remove button.

  • Constructor Details

    • WatchlistRow

      public WatchlistRow(IStock stock, Runnable onRemove)
      Constructs a WatchlistRow for the given stock. Populates common properties, sets the current price, and attaches a remove button callback.
      Parameters:
      stock - the IStock to display
      onRemove - callback invoked when the remove button is clicked
